metadata.title: CVE-2024-42157 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:s390/pkey: Wipe sensitive data on failureWipe sensitive data from stack also if the copy_to_user() fails.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
